__e: Yes, Amy, I'm here. Just lower your voice a little.
Why is everything always about business with you? Take that damn bass out of your voice when you're talking to me!
I'm sorry to disappoint you all, but please keep your voices down so my mama can get her rest.
Lower your weapons Or we all die together.
Put down your weapons and smile... as nice as you can.
Now put down your guns, save yourselves, - and get outta here!
Lower your gun coz it's over.
- Why don't you put your shotgun down, my friend? I'll be happy to tell you who I am.
Put your gun down, I'll kill by looking at you. I'll look at you and kill you.
Velocity to one-half meter per second.
Mr. Binh says drop your speed to three knots and adjust your rudder five degrees right.
I wish you'd slow down. You wouldn't make mistakes.
I know you're in a hurry to get home to your loved ones but slow down, they'll be at home waiting for you.
Actually, I think they meant "Slow down," talking to you.
He'll do everything in his power to protect the Duke.
Just put the gun down, and... - ... tell me what's happening.
Lower your gun, or it's last call for Mommy.
My god,they were lying to us all the time.
I bet that was the first time anyone ever used "Scuttle it" as a prayer.
- That's it. Take her out and sink her.
